item.title: Speeding traffic, 15th October
item.description:
The section of Plough Way between Lower Road and Yeoman Street is very prone to speeding traffic, including at night. This has been getting worse over the last 12 months. Consider installing speed cameras or road humps.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plough Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road parking sign pole, 15th October
item.description:
The pole and sign has been loose for a while but has now been vandalised and damaged. It may injure someone if left and is a hazard for pedestrians including children walking daily to the local school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Coopers Lane, Chinbrook, Grove Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red lights, 15th October
item.description:
Yesterday you had people working on the lights, they seem to of lengthened the red light timings , which now everyone is beeping all day and forcing the lead car to run the red light , I have witnessed many near accidents today due to people running the red light. I will also inform the police as this dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leinster Terrace, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
